text.title: Eleven Quebec locations to be renamed to remove racial slur
text.head: Eleven Quebec locations to be renamed to remove racial slur
Sources

list.item: Rachel Zellars. "Remove the term 'nigger' from all of Quebec's natural sites" — IPetitions , September 28, 2015 (date of access)
"Commission de toponymie — Introduction" — Commission de toponymie du Québec , September 28, 2014 (date of access)
"Quebec naming commission to change place names containing 'N-word'" — CTV News , September 26, 2015
The Canadian Press. "Quebec to rename sites over offensive N-word" — Blackburn News , September 26, 2015
